summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from July 10, 2019, discussing the need to execute a search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's residence for digital media and computer equipment. The email shows coordination between FBI squads, noting that most of the requesting agent's squad is in Florida interviewing victims.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email discusses planning to execute a search warrant at his residence for digital media and computer equipment.

events.title: Planned search of Epstein's residence
events.description: The FBI planned to execute a search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's residence for digital media and computer equipment.

events.title: FBI squad interviews victims in Florida
events.description: Most of the FBI's C-20 squad was in Florida conducting victim interviews related to the Epstein investigation.

keyFacts: On July 10, 2019, the FBI was planning to execute a search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's residence for digital media and computer equipment.
The search was planned for July 11, 2019, around 10-11 AM.
Most of the FBI's C-20 Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking squad was in Florida interviewing victims at the time.
The email shows coordination between FBI squads C-19 (Violent Crimes Task Force) and C-20 for investigative resources.
The document indicates active investigation into Epstein in July 2019, shortly before his arrest on July 6, 2019.
